H0.text: Which chemical element has the atomic number six. Oxygen

H1.text: Which chemical element has the atomic number six. Nitrogen

H2.text: Which chemical element has the atomic number six. Boron

H3.text: Which chemical element has the atomic number six. Carbon

A4.text: Carbon (from Latin carbo 'coal') is a chemical element; it has symbol C and atomic number 6.

A5.text: Isotopes of carbon are atomic nuclei that contain six protons plus a number of neutrons (varying from 2 to 16).
